comments.html: IPv6 is mandid for the ISP but I don't think so MPLS SP need to migrate on IPv6.
comments.name: shivlu jain

comments.html: At the moment, MPLS core cannot be moved to IPv6 as LDPv6 (LDP for IPv6) is not available. However, Cisco solutions 6PE & 6VPE can do a pretty good job if IPv6 is to be used between PE & CE.
comments.name: Guest

comments.html: I think the concept of Internet of things will use IPv6 intensively.
comments.name: Andrei

comments.html:
Good explanation, but I still think some pieces are missing, that I tried to bring forward in my reflection "what ISP needs to do for his customer (IPv6 wise)"
